resources.string:
2017.10.10-legacy:
 
 Be aware:
 There will most probably be no more bugfixes after this release for devices on Android <4.0!
 This version might stop working unexpectedly, if there are server side changes.
 
 · Fix: Login failed on geocaching.com
 · Fix: Failed to load more caches in search results
 · Fix: Username no longer shown on mainscreen
